item.title: BIOTECH, India, Turning food waste into biogas - Ashden Award winner
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LrtINiLgNKY This video can be downloaded here: http://www.ashdenawards.org/winners/biotech BIOTECH won an Ashden Award for Sustainable Energy in 2007. You can follow us …
